definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: You'll need a sharp knife and a wooden board for hashing up that meat.
sentences.chinese: 你需要一把利刀和一块菜板来切碎那块肉。

sentences.english: On a clean work surface, place one sheet of manicotti lengthwise.
sentences.chinese: 在一张干净的切菜板上放一片通心粉。

sentences.english: And you probably know it's smart to chop meats and veggies on separate boards.
sentences.chinese: 你可能知道切肉和切蔬菜的切菜板最好分开。

sentences.english: Discard worn out boards , as cut marks on them serve as hiding places for viruses.
sentences.chinese: 丢弃旧菜板，因为上面的刀痕是病毒隐藏的地方。

sentences.english: Bacteria can hide in a cutting board with lots of knife-cut indentations2.
sentences.chinese: 细菌可能会隐藏在切菜板上菜刀切破的凹口里。

sentences.english: I had more troubles than amount of chopped vegetables on the wooden cutting board in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 我的麻烦比我面前木菜板上切好的菜的数量还要多。

sentences.english: We can put our effort into other products such as our cutting board series.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以把心力放在其他商品，例如切菜板系列。

sentences.english: Use cutting board or a plate of glass as braying platform for Polaroid transfers.
sentences.chinese: 使用菜板或玻璃作为传输平台叫声的宝丽板。

sentences.english: Applicable for wiping off the water mark on the glassware utensils, bowl and dish, cutting board etc.
sentences.chinese: 适合玻璃器皿，碗碟，切菜板等表面等水渍拭干。

sentences.english: For a long time, experts stated that plastic chopping boards were more hygienic than wooden ones.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，专家称塑料切菜板比木菜板更加卫生。

sentences.english: For a long time, experts stated that plastic chopping boards were more hygienic than wooden ones.
sentences.chinese: 一直以来，专家称塑料切菜板比木菜板更加卫生。

sentences.english: And slice them with a knife on a cutting board.
sentences.chinese: 用刀在菜板上将它们切成片。

definition: see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
